Why Liverpool have begun the summer transfer window slowly

There are a number of factors to Liverpool's slow start

Nine days. A lot can happen in nine days.

Interest in Virgil van Dijk has ended – publicly, at least – while Naby Keita firmly remains an RB Leipzig player, the Bundesliga club insisting he is not for sale.

Ryan Sessegnon was firmly on and abruptly off the agenda, while Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and Andrew Robertson are two under consideration.

Kylian Mbappe, the Monaco teenage sensation, is no more than an aspiration.

The club are striving to progress with their intentions, but the first week has thrown up nothing but disappointment; a brick wall, forever being run into.

Naby Keita is one of Klopp’s top targets but Leipzig are currently unwilling to entertain offers for the highly-rated Guinea international, who has his heart set on a move to Anfield.

The manager has reassured supporters that “behind the scenes” which should come to fruition later in the window.

“Of course the transfer market opened a few days ago,” Klopp told Liverpoolfc.com.

“Yes, it will be a difficult one, maybe it’s getting more and more difficult, especially in England.

“But we have made a lot of good things so far. If you cannot see it so far, you can imagine we have done a lot of things behind the scenes.

“Sometimes you need to be patient and that’s what we are in the moment - to wait for the right moment and then we will see what happens.”

【now.com體育】利物浦名宿科拿認為，比利時中鋒盧卡古改投曼聯的決定並不明智，必會後悔。

比利時中鋒盧卡古（Romelu Lukaku）拒絕前效力球會車路士，以高價改投曼聯，惟前利物浦射手科拿日前在專欄寫道：「我感到莫名其妙，他居然選擇了曼聯。」

「有趣的是，盧卡古去為一個放棄他兩次的領隊賣命，無論他怎樣努力，摩連奴都不喜歡他。」42歲的科拿離開紅軍後曾效曼城，直至2012年正式掛靴。

「個人而言，我認為他的決定很奇怪，尤其是在交易前臨時轉向，究竟甚麼說服他把名氣和前途再次押注給摩連奴呢？」科拿補充道。
